description:
Whether you need to block out the snores of fellow campers or just want some peace and quiet on a layover, a good set of earplugs is a travel must have. These convenient silicone earplug cases let you keep a little portable silence close at hand.

  • Soft silicone case keeps 2 earplugs clean and easy to find
  • Squishy memory foam is gentle on your ear canals during long term wear
  • 32 dB noise reduction rated earplugs
  • Includes 2 cases and 3 sets of earplugs, so you can split the kit with a friend or stash them in multiple places
name: Matador Travel Earplugs Kit
